short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extends Mistral's webapp conversation navigation options

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adds a few buttons that help navigate long conversations in the Mistral's web app "Le Chat". 

- Hides all Mistral's responses
- Shortens your posts
- Each shortened post gets a button, and if you click that button, you're moved to that point of conversation, and Mistral's posts are shown again (everything returns to normal)
